short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bosa is the community-powered goal management platform to help you get it all out of your head and into action.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bosa is the community-powered goal management platform to help you get it all out of your head and into action. With the Bosa Chrome extension, you can easily collect goals from the various tools in your browser, so you can focus on taking action and achieving your goals.
